thread.section_title: Wiggle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle | wiggle.com.au
thread.title: Mark Page

author: Mark Page
title: Mark Page
text: I ordered some dhb bib shorts. Not familiar with the brand and Wiggle. I have my shorts, they are of high quality and fit perfectly. The product arrived a little later than initially advised, but Gold Coast Australia is a long way from the UK. I am keen to make other purchases. I got a very quick response when I queried my parcel when it was a little late. Overall experience has been a very good one.
